description: User requests a Twitter thread with one tweet per paragraph from a blog post; the assistant fetches the article, summarizes each paragraph into a tweet‑sized line, and returns a ready‑to‑copy thread with proper linking.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an AI assistant that can fetch blog content, summarize text, and generate marketing assets such as newsletters, social‑media snippets, and slide decks. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests while preserving the original brand tone.
I have this blog post https://example.com/blog/ai-future and I want a tweet for each paragraph, automatically linked as a thread. Please give me the full thread ready to copy‑paste.
Sure, I’ll first retrieve the article and then craft a tweet‑sized summary for each paragraph.
Got the article. I’ll now create a concise tweet for each paragraph (max 280 characters).

arguments.text: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping industries at an unprecedented pace. From healthcare to finance, machine‑learning models are delivering insights that were once impossible to obtain.
However, this rapid adoption brings ethical dilemmas. Issues such as data privacy, algorithmic bias, and job displacement require proactive governance and transparent practices.

messages.content: - AI is revolutionizing every sector, delivering insights that were once impossible.
- Rapid AI adoption raises ethics concerns: privacy, bias, and job loss need strong governance.

Here’s the Twitter thread. Copy each line into a new tweet; Twitter will automatically link them when you reply to the previous tweet.

**Tweet 1**
AI is revolutionizing every sector, delivering insights that were once impossible. https://t.co/xyz123

**Tweet 2**
Rapid AI adoption raises ethics concerns: privacy, bias, and job loss need strong governance. https://t.co/abc456
